headline.main: HOOVER DISPUTES POLL AT STANFORD; He Takes Own Survey Among Faculty and Says 60% Oppose Group's Call for Action

lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif., Oct. 2 -- On the basis of a personal poll of the Stanford University faculty, Herbert Hoover concluded today that 60 per cent of the members did not agree with 176 professors, associate professors and assistant professors who, in a recent statement termed "fallacious" the idea that a passive defense was still possible for this country and called for "a more dynamic policy of action."
abstract: disputes Stanford Univ poll on U S foreign policy; challenged by Dr L M Terman, poll com chmn
